Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
You have just learned the basic skills to manage contents in OpenCms. Of course, there is a lot more to discover. OpenCms is a full featured website CMS that allows creation of the most demanding websites. 

There is a lot more to discover

To get an impression about what else is available in OpenCms, click the Show menu on the toolbar and select Show workplace. This will bring up the OpenCms Workplace, our "power user" interface. There you can see the internal file structure of the pages that have been created, modify permissions and maintain other system aspects.

Click on any of the boxes below to continue exploring

The Release Notes contain information about what is new this OpenCms release. The Developer Demo contains basic technical examples for template developers, but is not very nice to look at. 

We recommend you start with the OpenCms Demo Website, which provides a full featured, nice looking example.
